content: Investments General Asked by AnonymousAsked on 28 Jun 2018What is the best way that I can open a CDP account? I am currently working overseas and have decided to invest in SSB, SGX etc but noted that I will need a CDP.?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Kenneth LouLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 29 Jun 2018Actually for this one, I don't think it is too difficult if you are a Singaporean citizen. Here are the steps:​1) Open up a bank brokerage account​2) Fill up the CDP form and get someone to mail it for you on your behalf to the relevant mailing address ​You can read the full step by step here: https://blog.seedly.sg/step-step-guide-opening-stock-trading-brokerage-cdp-account-singapore/0 comments0
Phyllis PoonLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 29 Jun 2018You can open a Singapore brokerage account and they will open a cdp account for you. For example,  dbs vickers0 comments0
